PRAYER: Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India for
issuance of Writ of Mandamus, directing the 1st respondent to regularize the
service of the petitioner from the date of initial appointment i.e. from the date
of entry into service in the light of judgment made in WP.No.4991 of 2015
dated 30.07.2019 and in the light of Judgment made in WP.No. 27923 of 2019
dated 27.11.2019 and by considering the petitioner's representation dated
25.01.2020, within the period that may be stipulated by this Court.
For Petitioner :
